releases.title: Quality of life in 2.0
releases.body:
Version 2 is here and opens up a world of simplicity for working between Illustrator and After Effects. 

- More intuitive layer creation from groups
- Split all shapes to layers with parenting hierarchy
- Precompose and Decompose groups 
- Modernization for working with new Ae systems
- Fixes

releases.title: Non-destructive shape expanding
releases.body: Shapes in Illustrator can often be too complicated for Ae to draw. Now when Overlord hits one of these shapes, it will automatically expand it, get the data, and then return it to its editable state in Illustrator.

releases.title: Clipping masks
releases.body: Thanks to the new universal track matte system in After Effects, it is now possible to replicate clipping masks with much greater accuracy.
